name: Complicity Inc.
description:
Greetings Employee #452783. You have a lot of work to do.

Made solo from scratch in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 40 based on the theme 'The more you have, the worse it is'. 

Out of 1040 LD40 compo entries Complicity Inc. was ranked 3rd for Theme, 12th for Mood and 26th Overall!
